entries.text: Metrics Server now requires access to the nodes/metrics RBAC resource instead of nodes/stats. No changes are needed if using official manifests, but update RBAC resources if using the Metrics Server image with custom manifests.
Updated the registry location from k8s.gcr.io to registry.k8s.io to reflect the new registry endpoint for Kubernetes images.
Fixed a bug causing kubectl get PodMetrics/NodeMetrics to fail.
Addressed a kernel bug that led to incorrect CPU usage data, ensuring more accurate CPU usage metrics.
Fixed deadline exceeded errors caused by failures during metric parsing.
Added handling for malformed metrics received from Kubelet.
Introduced a new CLI flag --kubelet-request-timeout to customize the timeout of requests to kubelet.
Added the ability to exclude nodes by labels via the --node-selector flag.
Added support for modifying the metric collection path on nodes using the metrics.k8s.io/resource-metrics-path annotation.
Permitted running metrics-server under PodSecurity restricted.
Migrated to Kubelet resource metrics endpoint.
